verses.verse: Ask <S%H7592><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> in the spring <S%H4456><s%> time, <S%H6256><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> who makes <S%H6213><s%> storm clouds, <S%H2385><s%> and he gives <S%H5414><s%> rain <S%H4456><s%> showers <S%H1653><s%> to everyone <S%H376><s%> for the plants <S%H6212><s%> in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

For the teraphim <S%H8655><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> vanity, <S%H205><s%> and the diviners <S%H7080><s%> have seen <S%H2372><s%> a lie; <S%H8267><s%> and they have told <S%H1696><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> dreams. <S%H2472><s%> They comfort <S%H5162><s%> in vain. <S%H1892><s%> Therefore they go <S%H5265><s%> their way like sheep. <S%H6629><s%> They are oppressed, <S%H6031><s%> because there is no shepherd. <S%H7462><s%>

My anger <S%H639><s%> is kindled <S%H2734><s%> against the shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> and I will punish <S%H6485><s%> the male goats; <S%H6260><s%> For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> has visited <S%H6485><s%> his flock, <S%H5739><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and will make <S%H7760><s%> them as his majestic <S%H1935><s%> horse <S%H5483><s%> in the battle. <S%H4421><s%>

From him will come forth <S%H3318><s%> the cornerstone, <S%H6438><s%> from him the nail, <S%H3489><s%> from him the battle <S%H4421><s%> bow, <S%H7198><s%> from him every ruler <S%H5065><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>

They shall be as mighty <S%H1368><s%> men, <S%H947><s%> treading down muddy <S%H2916><s%> streets <S%H2351><s%> in the battle; <S%H4421><s%> and they shall fight, <S%H3898><s%> because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is with them; <S%H7392><s%> and the riders on horses <S%H5483><s%> will be confounded. <S%H3001><s%>

"I will strengthen <S%H1396><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and I will save <S%H3467><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and I will bring them back; <S%H3427><s%> for I have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on them; <S%H834><s%> and they will be as though I had not cast them off: <S%H2186><s%> for I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> and I will hear them. <S%H6030><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> will be like a mighty <S%H1368><s%> man, <S%H3820><s%> and their heart will rejoice <S%H8055><s%> as through wine; <S%H3196><s%> yes, <S%H1121><s%> their children will see <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H1523><s%> and rejoice. Their heart <S%H3820><s%> will be glad <S%H8055><s%> in Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
I will signal <S%H8319><s%> for them, <S%H6908><s%> and gather them; <S%H6299><s%> for I have redeemed them; <S%H7235><s%> and they will increase as they have increased. <S%H7235><s%>

I will sow <S%H2232><s%> them among the peoples; <S%H5971><s%> and they will remember <S%H2142><s%> me in far countries; <S%H4801><s%> and they will live <S%H2421><s%> with their children, <S%H1121><s%> and will return. <S%H7725><s%>

I will bring them again <S%H7725><s%> also out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> them out of Assyria; <S%H804><s%> and I will bring <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> and Lebanon; <S%H3844><s%> and there won't <S%H4672><s%> be room enough for them.

He will pass through <S%H5674><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> of affliction, <S%H6869><s%> and will strike <S%H5221><s%> the waves <S%H1530><s%> in the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and all the depths <S%H4688><s%> of the Nile <S%H2975><s%> will dry up; <S%H3001><s%> and the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> will be brought down, <S%H3381><s%> and the scepter <S%H7626><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will depart. <S%H5493><s%>
I will strengthen <S%H1396><s%> them in Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and they will walk up and down <S%H1980><s%> in his name, <S%H8034><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
